Detailed Description

template<class Type, int len>
class RODOS::BlockFifo< Type, len >

A Fifo that lets you write or read continius Blocks of the stored type. Gives out pointers to the internal space, so you can copy data directly from/to there. Useful for DMA trasnfers.
